entity.name: Material
entity.query: select id, licenseType from Material WHERE ('${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR CONVERT_TZ(`added`, @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' OR CONVERT_TZ(`updated`, @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}') AND deleted = false

entity.name: Material_Title
entity.query: select title as title_id from Material_Title where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: LanguageString
entity.query: select textValue as title from LanguageString where id = '${Material_Title.title_id}'

entity.name: Material_Description
entity.query: select description as description_id from Material_Description where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: LanguageString
entity.query: select textValue as description from LanguageString where id = '${Material_Description.description_id}'

entity.name: Material_Author
entity.query: select author as author_id from Material_Author where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: Author
entity.query: select concat(name, ' ', surname) as fullname from Author where id = '${Material_Author.author_id}'

entity.name: Material_Tag
entity.query: select tag as tag_id from Material_Tag where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: Tag
entity.query: select name as tag from Tag where id = '${Material_Tag.tag_id}'

entity.name: Material_EducationalContext
entity.query: select educationalContext as eC_id from Material_EducationalContext where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: EducationalContext
entity.query: select educationalContext as educational_context from EducationalContext where id = '${Material_EducationalContext.eC_id}'

entity.name: Translation
entity.query: select translation as educational_context from Translation where translationKey = '${EducationalContext.educational_context}'

entity.name: Material_Subject
entity.query: select subject as subject_id from Material_Subject where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: Subject
entity.query: select name as subject from Subject where id = '${Material_Subject.subject_id}'

entity.name: Material_ResourceType
entity.query: select resourceType as resourceType_id from Material_ResourceType where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: ResourceType
entity.query: select resourceType as resource_type from ResourceType where id = '${Material_ResourceType.resourceType_id}'

entity.name: LicenseType
entity.query: select name as license_type from LicenseType where id='${Material.licenseType}'
